name: george2
body:
#General
Unless specifically stated otherwise, all code I publish to GitHub is available under a [BSD 3-clause license](http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause). 

If you need to contact me for some reason other than to submit an issue or pull request (though I can't imagine why you would), ping me on [freenode](irc://irc.freenode.net), or [email](https://github.com/george2/pkgbuilds/blob/master/dff/PKGBUILD) me. 

#Languages
Regardless of what GitHub says, these are the languages I generally work with:
* Shell (*nix/DOS)
* C
* C++ (with/without Qt Framework)
* Python (with/without Qt Framework)
* AutoHotkey

I also have some amount of familiarity with:
* VB.NET
* Java
* PHP
* x86 Assembly
* JavaScript

Other non-programming languages I use:
* HTML 4.01 Strict
* CSS 2.1
* XML (RSS/ATOM)
* Markdown (MediaWiki/GitHub)
* XSL (man pages!)

#ccr-tools
This is a GitHub organization I belong to. We write code for [Chakra GNU/Linux](http://chakra-linux.org/)'s source-based [community repository](http://chakra-linux.org/ccr/). The code is mostly bash or Python. You can learn more about the ccr-tools [here](http://ccr-tools.github.io).

#Repositories
Here's some info about my repos.
* [ahk-libs](http://george2.github.io/ahk-libs): A collection of AutoHotkey libraries from around the internet.
* [aur2ccr](http://george2.github.io/aur2ccr): A massive and terribly-written bash script that helps put Arch packages into the Chakra Community Repository.
* [bundles](http://github.com/george2/bundles): Some now-obsolete source files for non-supported Chakra bundles, and a bash script to manage them.
* [ccr-tools](http://george2.github.io/ccr-tools): Miscellaneous tools for the Chakra Community Repository.
* [dns-bash](http://george2.github.io/dns-bash): Strange bash scripts with dubious usefulness, all related to the domain name system.
* [dotfiles](http://george2.github.io/dns-bash): They're dotfiles.
* [george2.github.com](http://github.com/george2/george2.github.com): I'm So Meta, Even This Acronym.
* [ha-cluster-scripts](http://george2.github.io/ha-cluster-scripts): These will work soon(TM).
* [kapudan-kde-themes](http://github.com/george2/kapudan-kde-themes): Some [KDE](http://kde.org/) themes for [Kapudan](http://chakra-project.org/wiki/index.php?title=Kapudan).
* [math-c](http://george2.github.io/math-c): Math stuff in C/C++.
* [misc-bash](http://george2.github.io/misc-bash): Miscellaneous bash scripts, including the amazing `bundle`.
* [misc-chakra](http://george2.github.io/misc-chakra): Miscellaneous bash scripts that only work with [Chakra GNU/Linux](http://www.chakra-project.org/).
* [pkgbuild-tools](http://github.com/george2/pkgbuild-tools): Yeah... this doesn't exist. Sorry.
* [pkgbuilds](http://george2.github.io/pkgbuilds): My source files for [CCR](http://chakra-linux.org/ccr/) packages.
* [slipm-honeypot](http://george2.github.io/slipm-honeypot): A buggy and moderately useless honeypot script with a ridiculous name, written in bash.
* [spun](http://george2.github.io/spun): A bash script that works as an update notification tool for [Chakra GNU/Linux](http://www.chakra-project.org/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
